snippet: The Foreign Ministry said Tuesday that it hoped the nomination of Chuck Hagel to be the United States defense secretary would lead to ”practical changes” in Washington’s foreign policy.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry said Tuesday that it hoped the nomination of Chuck Hagel to be the United States defense secretary would lead to ”practical changes” in Washington’s foreign policy.

headline.seo: Iran: Foreign Ministry Voices Optimism in Hagel Nomination in U.S.
headline.main: Iran: Foreign Ministry Voices Optimism in Hagel Nomination in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Iran: Foreign Ministry Voices Optimism in Hagel Nomination in U.S.
